item.title: AI is taking over drive-thrus, and Wendys is the latest to jump in the game.
item.description: Skynet may become real after all… Is the Era of Human Drive-Thru Attendants Coming to an End?

item.title: Sam Altman-Chat GPT has no social features | Look 10 Years Ahead!
item.description: Sam Altman-Chat GPT, “Questioning the years of advice i gave to startups” # Create something unique and people will find you.
